website_summaries.verdict: A fun duo for kids who like drones and competitive play. Despite a few quirks, these drones have some impressive capabilities that you'd expect from Holy Stone.
pros: A pair of drones that shoot infrared beams for exciting battle play
Three speed moods make them suitable for novices as well as somewhat experienced drone operators
Drones get good altitude considering the price and size
cons: Some durability and longevity concerns, as the components are prone to breaking with rough play

website_summaries.verdict: The perfect battle drone set for beginners who want to get into the sport with very little learning curve required.
pros: 2 included drones let users start battling right away
Easily flips by pressing a button on the controller
Drones have unique “hit” behaviors so users know the score
Batteries charge quickly, within 45 minutes, and charge lasts 12+ minutes
cons: Blade guards and propellers can snap after a few hard landings or collisions

customer_reviews.title: Faulty controllers
customer_reviews.text: So I’m actually very disappointed with this purchase. The first time I ordered these drones the controllers would not work even with proven good 1.5 volt AAA batteries, so I returned it and received a replacement package. 2nd package came in today so I check the the controllers first, only one controller works...like cmon fix the wiring inside. Drones are fun and perform well though, except the wiring to the battery I could tell would get torn over time. Just a controller problem really.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Fun little drones
customer_reviews.text: These are fun little drones. My roommate and I are having a blast flying them around our apartment. I doubt you would want to fly them outside unless there's very little wind. These guys are light! They don't last too long (6-8 minutes) but the batteries also don't take very long to recharge. They are fairly easy to fly once you get used to the controls. The trim buttons work but you will have to readjust each time if/when you crash. All in all not bad for the price. It's definitely the most fun thing I've bought in a while. Probably a good entry point for drones.
customer_reviews.author: jsnknght

customer_reviews.title: Just plain fun
customer_reviews.text: I have never flown a drone before but I used to fly RC planes when I was a kid. It took me about 10 minutes, one lost prop and one busted prop cover thing and I had it. The busted prop cover doesn't even seem to matter either. I am 45 and was giggling like a school girl. The battery life is just about 3-5 minutes for me but it is a whole lot of fun. I havn't even tried battle mode with them yet but I am guessing my kids will get a kick out of it. For this price point, these are a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Schwing

customer_reviews.title: Zippy multiplayer fun!
customer_reviews.text: These drones are superfast and superfun. I also have the HS200D, and while it's bigger and more substantial than these, the battle drones are so speedy and fun. The maneuvering takes a little getting used to because you need to learn to control your speed with these, but they have some fun features you don't see every day. The flip option makes it especially fun to play the "laser tag" game. They're also fun to just fly around separately. They work best indoors in a room with high ceilings. Definitely a great purchase if you're looking for something with fun capabilities and have a little more experience operating drones.
customer_reviews.author: therockkhrd

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: Holy Stone June especially goes above and beyond to make you a Holy Stone Drone person. I already thought they was good company for drones now they better I jus didn’t like these ones I own a few Holy Stone drones and they all perdy cool These jus not for me. we have beginner drones from Holy Stone and Bolt bees which are great we have mavic pros we have tinyhawks the Hawk 5. June wanted to make me happier than I was with them so offered other drone
customer_reviews.author: TNinLP

customer_reviews.title: Not a great experience
customer_reviews.text: Propellers broke immediately. My uncle tried setting it up for my nephew and he was unable to get them functioning for more than 20 minutes. He owns a lot of remote control planes and a drone. I’d return it but they threw away the box
customer_reviews.author: Kymm Spillane

customer_reviews.title: With practice, these are great for children.
customer_reviews.text: We got six battle drones HS177 for Christmas. The first day was filled with teaching children how to use them. There was an online video review that was particularly helpful. After spending hours helping children trim, learn the controls, and fixing propellors after they crashed, I wondered if they were worth it. However, the second day the children were having great battles. Evan after many crashes as a result of children learning how to use them, the drones are still working well. There will continue to be crashes, but overall, I think these are pretty amazing little drones. We are now prepared to battle cousins, who also got the same drones for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald N. Guymon

customer_reviews.title: Good but broke quick....GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: One of the drones arms broke within two days. I have had other cheap drones and my kids Havre banged them around no issues. A few have broke after some time. But right out of the box one was flying a little weird until it just completely went ape.... I quickly discovered that the arm had separated from the body....maybe it was just defective. I'll give them another shot Update; after they saw that my drone broke that sent me a whole new one....1 star earned for service. 1 more star will be given if this drone doesnt break
customer_reviews.author: Tier1Carpentry Miami

customer_reviews.title: These drones are very cool! I ordered these for me and my 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: These drones are very cool! I ordered these for me and my 10 year old son to play with. We aren’t “drones” so I was a bit nervous but these things are easy to fly and maneuver in doors. There are kind of a lot of buttons on the controllers but once you get them figured out there are no problems. I ordered four spare batteries and a four port charger at the same time- I would recommend purchasing these as well- changing batteries is easy and having more prolonges the fun. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Joe Scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Drone for beginners and intermediate users. These drones can really maneuver! An advantage to being light-weight, these drones can turn on a dime. They are fast, agile and ready to go! Another great feature is "Battle mode". Here, you will get to battle with a friend or family member by shooting IR lasers at each others drone. When a drone gets hit 3 times, it will safely land and declare defeat. If you are thinking about a great drone purchase, check out these drones!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: HolyStone for the win (again)
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th Holy Stone drone purchase, so I knew I wouldn't be completely disappointed. I was prepared for these to be not of the best quality since the laser tag feature is the main selling point. I was wrong. Each drone was airborne after a quick charge. They are very stable as far as altitude hold and maneuverability. As a set this is a bargain as each drone is pretty solid standing on its own. Holystone FTW again. .
customer_reviews.author: pdxspp

customer_reviews.title: did not work - would not charge
customer_reviews.text: Product looks amazing, son was so psyched to start battles. Instead he was very disappointed in this gift. Neither of the drones would ever charge despite our best efforts. We asked techies and other smart adults and none of them could make it work. No matter how closely we followed the directions. An extreme disappointment. Would never buy this brand again for fear of this happening again. Felt scammed. Rotors never even spun. Got put aside and forgotten so now cannot return. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Tressa

customer_reviews.title: Good flying little birds. You will have fun with these. Some skill needed.
customer_reviews.text: These are really fun. If your just starting out you may want to get something slower actually. Lol These things are fast! Three speeds with the fastest being really fast. Almost to fast for this little bird. The emergency stop is the best feature. Keeps you from chewing up blades. Lots of fun will good battery life. I'd say about 6 - 7 min of easy flying. 5 min on speed two doing fast.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: So much fun in a small package and so much technology for very little money.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical whether these would be "good flyers" but am pleasantly surprised. They are fun to fly and are pretty steady and accurate to fly. Lots of features for an incredible price. (I got mine for $45 on a lightening deal) The battle function was my greatest doubt, but you can battle with a friend and it works great! The batteries last a very respectable amount of time. These things are so fun and very durable. We have crashed them into nearly everything including each other. They are durable.
customer_reviews.author: LouCigar

customer_reviews.title: Solid 4 out of 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it's a very cool toy. Controls are pretty responsive (except trim) and relatively easy to figure out, even for my 6 year old. The one touch take off and landings have been a life saver. My only complaints are that I found it really hard to trim it out, and my son and I couldn't seem to score any hits while in "battle mode"...not sure if this had to do with it being pretty light outside. Battery life is only about 15 minutes, tops, so you'll want to buy a couple extras.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great For Beginners or Advanced
customer_reviews.text: We had no experience with drones whatsoever and I have two teenagers (14 and 16). Got them this for Christmas and they have been having lots of fun ever since. The drones are easy to learn to fly and very responsive. It even comes with some back up propellers included. My kids can race or battle or just fly solo. I researched quite a bit and truly believe I got the right ones.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drones and customer service
customer_reviews.text: These drones are worth the money. Additionally, if you like then on Facebook they'll send you extra blades which you'll need. My 9yr old banged into some walls and couches when first learning to fly these and the blades popped off very easily. I am getting a free battery also for leaving this review, but I truly love the product. They are fun for me (31yrs old) and my son. For the price, they're a very good drone. I thought they'd be a cheap toy, but I was blown away by this drone. I highly recommend this drone and this company
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Cute little buggers
customer_reviews.text: Came completely assembled, the only thing I needed was batteries for the controllers. Drones were almost fully charged when they arrived, which was nice. Instructions were simple enough, simple flick of the left stick and the drone is good to go. Controls are easy to use, just gotta get used to a small, fast, flying drone. Came with extra blades and another "cover" for one of the drones. Unfortunately I didn't have a "player 2" and had to improvise their use. Fun little toy for two people(or one with two toys), I do recommend if you are looking for a "battle drone" to have. That's all I got for now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little drones!!!
customer_reviews.text: These drones are awesome! They are great for beginners and above. This is my first ever drone, and it took me less than 3 minutes to learn basic flying. The flip function is awesome,and battle mode is so much fun too. My only gripes are that the battery is a little hard to put in (and I mean just a little), the battery slides out the back a bit which shifts the weight towards the rear of the drone, and the beeps on the remote are pretty loud. Battery life is awesome, and they charge fast too. Buy these drones, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Miller

customer_reviews.title: A steal at $30/quad
customer_reviews.text: I've been causally flying quad copters for about 3 years, and my son got into the hobby a year ago. Between us we own 2 micro quads, each of which cost over a $100. Yet somehow these Holystone HS177s at $30 a piece ($60 for the pair) are just as maneuverable (at the expert level), and also pack in technology like headless mode and altitude holding that our other more expensive drones don't have. Oh yea and these can also battle one another. It's a frankly stunning coup on Holy Stone's part to have produced quads that fly this well with this much technology at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Sir INYSH

customer_reviews.title: Best flying drones!
customer_reviews.text: Still works great after having for a couple of months & some not so smooth landings. Great for the price since you get two to battle with, the flipping is amazing, battling works great and controls are easy to use. My 16 year old and 8 year old both love so their not just collecting dust, like other flying gidgets or toys we have. Only downside is charge only holds for 15 minutes or so, besides that fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: TabWar

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Dont recommend to buy and it is very low quality, hardly to run for just one time and it got break.
customer_reviews.author: Shahid Shafi

customer_reviews.title: It was fun while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked well at first, but after the first 10 uses or so the gyro wouldn't calibrate properly and the "battle" function stopped working. The gyro trimming capability was mediocre to begin with but doesn't work at all now. The drones can't even shoot each other at point blank range at this point. It was fun while it worked though, which is why I'm leaving a two star review instead of one.
customer_reviews.author: Leeanna

customer_reviews.title: Just ok I guess...was supposed to be 4 body covers, there was only 3....
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price, controllers keep getting switched, blades keep coming off, still hvnt figured out how 2 shoot each other down
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hoyland

customer_reviews.title: Could not ask for more with The Holy Stone support team and product!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are some extremely fun drones that have provided hours of fun for my son and I. Definitely best played with indoors, since the IR lazers are effected by sunlight. However if your going to use the 3rd speed setting it best be a huge indoor area because these things are super fast.. For the price of these drones , the fun times created for my son and I ,and the extremely excellent support that comes from the holy stone team, there is no way you could rate this product anything less than 5 stars.. extremely happy customer here!!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Product is great for the price. I did have an issue with one of the controllers being doa. But I contacted support and let them know that i was giving it to my daughter for Christmas. They shipped a new unit and I will receive it in time for Christmas. I'm extemely happy with support. Top notch.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thayne

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Our drones did not shoot each other from the get go. They flew great, were easy to fly, and super fun but the battle function didn't work. I emailed Holy Stone and explained the problem. They asked for a video to demonstrate it. They eventually sent us a whole new pair of drones and told me I could keep the first set. The new ones arrived today from Amazon and they work perfectly. I couldn't ask for better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: They are not responsive when turning, moving forwards and backwards is very quick. But as you fly them faster they become even less responsive when trying to turn.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Hours of indoor fun!
customer_reviews.text: These little drones are awesome. They’re easy to learn. Don’t let the size fool you because they’re fast and durable. Because of their lightweight, they can’t handle any outdoor wind. I’ve spent many winter hours flying these in the house. Best little battle drones on the market by far.
customer_reviews.author: Kokomo Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fun Drones For One Week
customer_reviews.text: Updated: One drone didn’t last a week past Christmas. The propellers come off really easy and when trying to put one back on the wiring pulled out. These are great for beginners. Lots of fun for the whole family. Each battery only lasts about 10 minutes so get some extras.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Motors did not work on the blue one fresh out the box
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Tough little drones, fun to fly for all ages in smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: I bought two boxes totaling 4 drones for my 4 kids, these are our first drones. We are all impressed, they have taken a learner beating quite well, we have a small yard and with the four of then in the sky and 4 learner pilots, crushing is inevitable!! after two weeks of flying nothing is broken. They are fun to fly, they are tough and control is quite easy with altitude hold. We ave not even tried headless mode yet!! I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: David Kakaire

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and super stable!
customer_reviews.text: This drones are amazingly stable and easy to control for such small quad-copters, and they are a blast to fight with! I had an issue with one of the power ports and Holy Stone immediately sent me a replacement. Great customer support!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C. Frey

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 4 hours
customer_reviews.text: Literally had it 4 hours before it broke. Put the battery in for a 4th flight, and it just flips over. Tried recalibrating, swapping all propellers, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Veiny Brainy

customer_reviews.title: Great little drone, but blades break easily
customer_reviews.text: We had a bunch of fun with these drones. The are fairly easy to fly. We really did enjoy the battle mode! Unfortunately in under two days we broke the 4 B replacement blades and the fun now ends until we can get more.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, easy to use drones!
customer_reviews.text: I have researched indoor drones for months. These are great indoors and outdoors! Ready to use, just charged the batteries and had fun in less than an hour. Very easy to control. Altitude hold makes this very stable. "battling" is easy and so much fun. Going to get another set so we can have 4 drones at once in the ring. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: JohnR

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: I just added these to my collection of HS drones. They are great fun ! The best part is when your opponent is hit by the signal it reacts by flipping, shaking and spinning each hit is a different reaction and on the 4th hit it will go down. They are also great just to fly around. Another great product from Holy Stone!
customer_reviews.author: David Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Fun for whole family can fly 4 at once cor red vs blue battles
customer_reviews.text: Fun drones that fly great. We bought 2 sets so we can have 4 way battles or red vs blue battles. Easy to fly, quick charging batteries. Even came with extra parts. Holy Stone really has great drones & awesome customer service. Highly recomended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig robb

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: I got two sets for Christmas so my three boys and I could lazer tag together. We had a blast on Christmas Eve racing them around the house. We have played with them daily for almost a week and have not had any mechanical issues yet. My only disappointment was by buying 2 sets, we have only 3 color choices. I ended up order the spare parts kit to get the fourth color (yellow).
customer_reviews.author: John Shearin

customer_reviews.title: Fun but buy spare rotors
customer_reviews.text: 4 star for the price but 2 star compared to a $50+ drone. If you're careful it's pretty and fast. The flip is easy to use. Remotes seem to hold up. After 3-4 crashes I lost 2 rotors(not literally but they wont stay attached anymore)
customer_reviews.author: Japdawap

customer_reviews.title: So impressed with these
customer_reviews.text: These are a blast. Fun and fast. Easy to fly. Only con is the flight time is not too long, but the battery charges quickly. I plan on getting one of their bigger drones because these are so well made.
customer_reviews.author: PHXScorpion

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: Very fun, easy to learn. However mine came with an issue with one of the controls. But I’ll be contacting the company about that issue, and depending on how it’s resolved I’ll place it at 5*. Easy to open, easy to understand, very user friendly. Do yourself the favor of reading the instructions though.
customer_reviews.author: Gianni

customer_reviews.title: Two drones are better than one!
customer_reviews.text: This little drone set is one of best purchases I've made in a while. They are so fun to play with together with a friend or family member. They are simple and versatile. There are a couple of features I really like...first, this is an inexpensive drone with lots of great features. Second, it hovers when you let go of the control with a simple trim setup. Third, it does flips. I'm going to post a video with the flips. Super fun!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Moody

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun to fly around the house. My original set had a defective controller but a very nice customer service representative sent me a replacement set and the first couple of drone battles were a blast. Lots of fun for myself and my 11 year old son. Excellent product and great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: F. P. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great first time drone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent drone for first time users. Easy to learn to fly. Seems suprisingly durable. Laser shooting is very wide ranging, you do not need to be overly accurate. Batteries last longer than I anticipated. They seem to last about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun, battery life is only about 10 minuets, though.
customer_reviews.text: These were a present for my 12 year old grandson. He really liked them. He battles with his friend and with younger brothers and sister, (father also) However another set of batteries are supposed to be sent by doing a review. Not sure if it is here on Amazon or for the Holy Stone company.
customer_reviews.author: LRBX

customer_reviews.title: Too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: These little drons are great, but I feel like they are too sensitive. Is hard to fly them without hitting something.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Get extra batteries to get more fly time each charge doesn’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: Product is great as well as customer service Takes a little bit to get used to how the drones fly but once you get it figured out lots of fun I have two boys one 8 years old and the other is 9 years old and they both figured out how to fly them with a little practice
customer_reviews.author: Retro girl

customer_reviews.title: Great drone
customer_reviews.text: This drone is easy to control indoor and give me a lot of fun. They have altitude hold, one key take off and landing, 3 speeds and 360o rolls. The more interesting thing is that it has left/right hand control modes. There are two drones in one package, so I can battle my friend using the two drones, which gives me a lot of fun. High recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: These little Buggers own top of the class on best Bang for the Buck!
customer_reviews.text: These things are Fantastic!! They fly excellently and are very durable as well. Did I mention how fun the Laser Tag features are?!! You have to see it to believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great drone! Flies well and can go really fast. Supremely addicting! If you are looking for some outside fun with a friend or otherwise this is no doubt the best way to do it! The only complaint is that the battery doesn't last an amazing amount of time, but it still gives plenty of time to have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start flying with!
customer_reviews.text: Drones were super easy to get flying with! They actually do have position hold that works! It’s really important to recalibrate frequently. The recipient of these was an experienced flyer and I am not, and we both have a ton of fun in battle mode with these. Definitely get some extra batteries though!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I bought cheap drones before and ultimately ended up returning them. These are amazing for the price. My 5 year old is able to fly them after some practice. crashing them is inevitable but nothing has permanently broken yet. The propellers pop off but all you have to do is put them back on. I recommend buying extra batteries because they last less than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: DAN HITNER

customer_reviews.title: Only <$100 drone we’ve tried that lasts more than a handful of flights
customer_reviews.text: This was our fourth attempt at having a drone for my kids. Didn’t want some huge complex expensive thing, but prior three drones didn’t last more than a handful of flights before something broke and there aren’t any spare parts available. These guys are easy to fly, great stability, and even come with some spare propellers!
customer_reviews.author: Mason Arnold

customer_reviews.title: First time Drone owner
customer_reviews.text: Love the drones. Easy to set up and started flying immediately. Great for indoors and outside as long as there is not much wind. Big hit for everyone at Christmas, kept the adults entertainer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my nephews. It is easy for kids under the age of ten to use due to the “standby hover “ when they release the controller. They play with them indoors and we have had no issues of breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Indoor toys
customer_reviews.text: The charge doesnt last long but the fun you will have crashing 5hem into everything in your home will be priceless. Worry not, though, they are so small and light the damage will only affect your pride in skill. Lol. Thank you for these gems.
customer_reviews.author: Steve E.

customer_reviews.title: Update. One of the drones was defective, Holy Stone made it right and sent me another
customer_reviews.text: Both drones worked but one of them proved uncontrollable and was lost in the woods. Holy Stone, with their usual great customer service, sent me another one. All is good.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lake

customer_reviews.title: Fun little drones
customer_reviews.text: Although we haven't tried a battle yet, the drones are pretty simple to maneuver and are a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun. My husband and teen boys had them going in minutes. They are easier to fly than many other drones they’ve tried. The battle part was a bonus after they learned to fly them. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This product was Cheaply made. The blades come off every time it crashes. The extra blades are labeled A1 a to B1B to but I had to call Holystone customer service to find out That information. I purchased six of them and they all broke within one day. Total waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Howard brown

customer_reviews.title: Order extra batteries and a multiport charger so the fun doesn't have to stop on those rain days.
customer_reviews.text: These battle drones are so much fun. My daughter is 10 and caught on within 2 batteries and was kicking my but. The 3 speeds is awesome as well for your beginners to your novice UAV pilots.
customer_reviews.author: John Plake

customer_reviews.title: Hard learning curve
customer_reviews.text: They are very hard to set trim and tilt. When begining, they will take off right into the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Brines

customer_reviews.title: Great drones!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 year old grandson! He has had many other drones and this if by far the best quality and most durable drones! The battle option is an cool feature and is something even I can operate. We’ve had hours of fun. Great product with exceptional customer service.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: These little things are awesome! I would definitely recommend purchasing extra batteries. The drones fly very nicely, and are easy to get the hang of. Happy with the quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: GMoney

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, many functions like auto start auto land altitude hold and battle mode. these make a fun gift for kids as young as 7 years old. very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: William E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun to fly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service. The drones came on time in very substantial package. The. Directions were easy to understand although the print was very small. The drones were easy to fly thanks to the built in altitude control feature. The quickly the turns groom some getting used to. All in all a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: MAMSEIN

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: My son and husband had a wonderful time playing with these drones. They figured the controls out very quickly. We had a couple issues with our drone and I contacted customer service. Seriously, I had an email responding Christmas Eve and everything was remediated. They were actually better at keeping in contact than I was. AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Feierabend

customer_reviews.title: Great drone!
customer_reviews.text: Great drone! I've recently gotten into quadcopters and have acquired a dozen or so toy grade quads. So far, this has been the easiest and most fun to fly. I give it only four stars because though I paid extra for next day delivery, it actually took 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: nhmotto

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for the price...
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best small drones I have ever had. They are difficult enough to keep an experienced person happy, but simple enough for a novice as well. They have been crashed quite a few times since Christmas had a few propellers lost, but still fly great. They hover very well with a little work on the trimming. Great fun for everyone in the family...my wife has even used it very well.
customer_reviews.author: shellyb

customer_reviews.title: Battle Drones! You heard that right, these are a blast.
customer_reviews.text: These two drones were a blast! So glad I bought them, my family of four love to team up and have battles with them. Even my wife figured out the controls! So much fun even if you don’t use battle feature (my boy and girl divided them up). Definitely an unique and enjoyable addition to the Holy Stone line.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Michael Kocak

customer_reviews.title: Durable little suckers!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a beginner like me! Quick to get up and running, a bit harder to get the hang of. Have had some spectacular crashes (user error) but these things are tough. The only damage they’ve sustained is a propeller popping off. Easy to snap back on, however I can see how easy it would be to lose these tiny props. Thankfully these come with plenty of spare parts.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Maravetz

customer_reviews.title: Bam
customer_reviews.text: Loved Em. Extra batteries I bought went over very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Moughler

customer_reviews.title: Cool Mini for Indoor Battles
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to fly drone with trim easily accessed on controller. Wife had first drone flight under control in seconds and should make a great target.
customer_reviews.author: Ammo5000

customer_reviews.title: Quality Drones, Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: These drones are exactly as described. They are quick, responsive, and have decent battery life for the price. The dueling concept is great fun, but takes a little practice to get used to. Would be nice to have an indicator when duel mode is on and off. Glad to see there are dedicated controls for adusting trimming.
customer_reviews.author: N Shw

customer_reviews.title: Not really for a kid way to much reading to play with
customer_reviews.text: So much to read for a beginner still haven’t read through the manual yet. It’s like a book.
customer_reviews.author: Ande Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very stable!
customer_reviews.text: The drones are small but very stable and easy to control. Battery life is good and the batteries recharge quickly. I highly recommend these drones, especially for flying inside or in controlled spaces - you'll have a great time!
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Works good! But fragile!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son. He loved them. They worked really good until a wire broke on one of them within the first week, so he could no longer use that one. He was so disappointed. They work good but do seem to be pretty fragile... :(
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Fun to fly once you figure everything out
customer_reviews.text: Fun drones to use with the family took a little time figuring it out and Quite frankly still am other than that we enjoy them!
customer_reviews.author: zach w.

customer_reviews.title: fantastic fun
customer_reviews.text: these drones are zippy and easy to fly. it is a lot of fun to chase each other around and do tricks. it makes it fun to get flying skills and learn how to operate the sticks. great job Holystone.
customer_reviews.author: gemlvr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but a bit fragile
customer_reviews.text: These drones have been a lot of fun to use especially while have dog fights. However one of the drones got knocked about during an emergency landing and stopped functioning. It's not clear what happened. Taking off the cover was not helpful as the all there is is a circuit board and so it's not clear what happened. But when they work, they are quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Even my younger boy(8yrs old) learned how to control them in a day. Its their favorite drones to fly and they haven't even started using the battle mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The HS177 RC Battle Drones Are very fun. They handle very well and can be flown ...
customer_reviews.text: The HS177 RC Battle Drones Are very fun. They handle very well and can be flown indoors I. A large area. The individual controls make it easy to do heads up battle. The simulated altitude hold works good for this price point Drone. The interchangeable shell makes it nice to change the appearance of the drone. The package comes with two USD charging dongles. The battle function is very fun. I would recommend buying these drones for the price point. The Holy Stone customer support is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Linkous

customer_reviews.title: This set of drones is so much fun. They are light weight and very agile
customer_reviews.text: This set of drones is so much fun. They are light weight and very agile. The battle drone mode is a very nice addition. It makes a fun drone even better. They fly a lot like the hs-170 predator with the added altitude hold. I highly recommend this set for anyone looking to have fun with your friends and family flying quadcopters. Holy stone, you’ve done it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cioffari

customer_reviews.title: Durable survives wall crashes
customer_reviews.text: Easy too fly ....the bad is putting in the battery.....really need good eyes ....The first set of drones got damaged putting in the battery....sent back got my replacement now I know ....overall super fun.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Favel

customer_reviews.title: Great little drones!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very simple and easy to use; love the auto hover and land features. The only difficulty I had was the plug in the back - big fingers/tiny plug made for a little struggling to get it powered up. My 4-yr old loves these drones, the best I've found so far for young ones to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley A. Bloye

customer_reviews.title: Fun toys
customer_reviews.text: These surprised me with their quality and how much fun they are to use.
customer_reviews.author: John Camp

customer_reviews.title: they work great lots of fun flying with my son thank youHoly ...
customer_reviews.text: they work great lots of fun flying with my son thank youHoly Stone HS177 RC Battle Drones Holy Stone HS177 RC Battle Drones
customer_reviews.author: tony collins

customer_reviews.title: Fun product,  good value.
customer_reviews.text: Once we figured out how to use them correctly they were a lot of fun to play with. Great value for they price!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: fun, kids love em
customer_reviews.text: tricky to get used to, and fragile, but a lot of fun. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C.Rooster

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: Haven't flown them yet, but I loved the other drone we had which was this brand
customer_reviews.author: R. Hershberger

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Blade guard broke in the first 15 min of use
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Drones work great. Haven't taken inside but are loads of fun outside. Very durable I've crashed a few times even had propeller fall off was able to stick it back on and keep going. Battery life is longer than expected at least 10min.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Allen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We(my grandsons and I) have had a lot of fun with these so far. The sequence of getting them in the air must be followed. I liked that I was able to go to the Holy Stone website and print off the instructions on a full page. The battle feature is really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Cantale

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun! My boys (7&8) were able to fly these around first time out of the box. The only downside would be a few lost propellers and having to take a break to charge the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: 123bradley

customer_reviews.title: My first drone and I love them, lots of fun to fly with my ...
customer_reviews.text: My first drone and I love them, lots of fun to fly with my grandchildren, family and friends, (Battle Mode) or just fly them regular inside or outside. Buy extra batteries and charger because you want to keep flying, so much FUN!!! Holy Stone Customer Service are Great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nonno

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Do not hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Those drones are absolutely fantastic! The controls are responsive and the drones are very snappy. Great for beginners and intermediate! I crashed few times and they are holding like champs! 'Battle mode' works surprisingly well for such small and inexpensive drones. I will have tons of hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Georgi Dungarov

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for grandsons and they had a blast with them.
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Poorly put together.
customer_reviews.text: The propellers randomly fly off as the drone is flying. Definitely not worth the $45 when propellers go flying off outside and can't be found. We got about 5 minutes of play time. Returning item.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining to fly around. On about the 10th ...
customer_reviews.text: Very entertaining to fly around. On about the 10th or 15th flight I broke one of the arms but hot glued it back. I than reinforced every joint with hot glue and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

product_meta.title: Holy Stone HS177 RC Battle Drones with Infrared Emission RTF Quadcopter with 2.4GHz 4 Channel 6-Axis Gyro and Altitude Hold Function, Headless Mode and Emergency Stop, Color Red and Blue, Quantity 2
feature_bullets: BATTLE DRONE FULL OF GREAT FUN: You can defeat the opponent by shooting the infrared. After 4 hits, the HS177 will land slowly. Interesting function to play with friends and families.
3D FLIPS: Just press the button on the transmitter, then the drone will do 360 degrees flip, (forward/backward/left/right) continuous rotation for perfect action and wonderful performance.
ALTITUDE HOLD: Drone will hover steadily at a setting height, which makes it easy to control the drone. It is a good assistance for kids and novices.
HEADLESS MODE: No worry being confused with the drone’s direction when it flies far away. In this mode, the front is whichever way the pilot is facing. Easy for everyone to control.

MORE TO KNOW: 4 Colors of fuselages for you to choose; Low Power Alert; 3 Speed Modes; Emergency Stop; Left/Right Hand Control Modes; One Key Engine Start/Landing; One Key Recalibration; One Key to Adjust LED Light; Long Flying Time up to 9mins; Swift, Stable and Flexible etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars263 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
